metadata.title: CVE-2022-26280 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Libarchive v3.6.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via thecomponent zipx_lzma_alone_init.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.4.0-2ubuntu1.2
libarchive13 - 3.4.0-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.0-2ubuntu1.2').
